this commit just adds the full changes that jasny made in his fork. Now

author: mjjoyce
msg: Added a fork of Twitter Bootstrap that makes file upload widgets not fugly.
Check out the docs for this at

author: mjjoyce
msg: Updated bootstrap-modal to use a new ng-view scheme
The body of the modal is loaded from a partial instead of the entire structure.
If the entire structure is loaded from a partial there is an issue with
the close events being bound to the appropriate buttons. This means that you
can't click between views and still close the modal. It also caused issues
with the modal activation button functioning properly. The current way is
slightly less clean and loses a bit of customization but at least it works.
